      • persistConfiguration

        public void persistConfiguration(String shardingSchemaName,
                                 Map<String,org.apache.shardingsphere.core.config.DataSourceConfiguration> dataSourceConfigs,
                                 org.apache.shardingsphere.api.config.RuleConfiguration ruleConfig,
                                 org.apache.shardingsphere.core.rule.Authentication authentication,
                                 Properties props,
                                 boolean isOverwrite)
        Persist rule configuration.
        参数:
        shardingSchemaName - sharding schema name
        dataSourceConfigs - data source configuration map
        ruleConfig - rule configuration
        authentication - authentication
        props - sharding properties
        isOverwrite - is overwrite registry center's configuration
